IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO SUPPORT THE WORK OF THE CATHOLIC RELIGIOUS, CHARITABLE, AND EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS AND THEIR MINISTERIES WITHIN THE DIOCESE OF FALL RIVER.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO SUPPORT THE WORK OF THE CATHOLIC RELIGIOUS, CHARITABLE, AND EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS AND THEIR MINISTERIES WITHIN THE DIOCESE OF FALL RIVER. ALSO TO PROVIDE PROPER MANAGEMENT OF THE ASSETS AND RESOURCES OF THE FOUNDATION AND THE DIOCESAN INSTITUTIONS AND TO PROVIDE FOR THE CURRENT AND FUTURE NEEDS OF THE DIOCESE AND DIOCESAN INSTITUTIONS WITHIN THE GEOGRAPHIC BOUNDARIES OF THE DIOCESE OF FALL RIVER.
IRS990.Desc: ADVANCE THE MISSION OF THE DIOCESE OF FALL RIVER AND TO STRENGTHEN THE COMMUNITY AND PARISHES, ASSIST IN SECURING THE FINANCIAL RESOURCES NEEDED FOR REBUILDING FAITH AND HOPE

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.PersonNm: MOST REVEREND EDGAR M DA CUNHA

BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: ROMAN CATHOLIC BISHOP OF FALL RIVER

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART II, LINE 10, EXPLANATION OF OTHER INCOME:

OtherLiabilitiesOrgGrp.Desc: DUE TO THE ROMAN CATHOLIC BISHOP OF FALL RIVER

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE TO BE USED TO SUPPORT GOOD SHEPHERD PARISH, ST. VINCENT DE PAUL SOCIETY OF OUR LADY OF MOUNT CARMEL PARISH, ST. MARY'S, OUR LADY OF THE ISLE PARISH FOR PHYSICAL PLANT IMPROVEMENTS, AND SEMINARIAN EDUCATION.

THE ORGANIZATION RECOGNIZES THE TAX BENEFIT FROM ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITION ONLY IF IT IS MORE LIKELY THAN NOT THAT THE TAX POSITION WILL BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY THE TAXING AUTHORITIES, BASED ON THE TECHNICAL MERITS OF THE TAX POSITION. ANY TAX BENEFITS RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS FROM SUCH A POSITION ARE MEASURED BASED ON THE LARGEST BENEFIT THAT HAS A GREATER THAN 50% LIKELIHOOD OF BEING REALIZED UPON ULTIMATE RESOLUTION. MANAGEMENT HAS ANALYZED THE ORGANIZATION'S TAX POSITIONS, AND HAS CONCLUDED THAT NO LIABILITY FOR UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS SHOULD BE RECORDED RELATED TO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS TAKEN ON RETURNS FILED FOR OPEN YEARS (FOR YEARS ENDED JUNE 30, 2020 THROUGH JUNE 30,2022) OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN THE ORGANIZATION'S TAX RETURNS FOR THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2023. THE ORGANIZATION IDENTIFIES ITS MAJOR TAX JURISDICTIONS AS U.S. FEDERAL AND THE COMMONWEALTH OF MASSACHUSETTS; HOWEVER, THE ORGANIZATION IS NOT AWARE OF ANY TAX POSITIONS FOR WHICH IT IS REASONABLY POSSIBLE THAT THE TOTAL AMOUNTS OF UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS WILL CHANGE MATERIALLY IN THE NEXT TWELVE MONTHS. THE ORGANIZATION ALSO FOLLOWS THE POLICY TO RECOGNIZE INTEREST AND PENALTIES RELATED TO UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS (IF ANY) IN INCOME TAX EXPENSE. NO SUCH INTEREST AND PENALTIES HAVE BEEN RECORDED AS OF JUNE 30, 2023 AND 2022.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL GRANTS ARE REVIEWED BY MANAGEMENT AND MANAGEMENT REQUESTS INFORMATION FROM THE GRANTEES THAT THE FUNDS WERE USED FOR THE APPROPRIATE PURPOSES.

BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.TransactionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION'S FUNDRAISING EVENT WAS HELD AT THE ESTABLISHMENT OWNED BY RICHARD LAFRANCE.

THE ORGANIZATION HELD FUNDS IN THREE ACCOUNTS WITH A BANK FOR WHICH NICHOLAS CHRIST IS THE PRESIDENT OF THE BANK. IN ADDITION, THE ORGANIZATION ALSO OWNS FIVE INVESTMENT PORTFOLIOS WITH AN INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT COMPANY THAT IS 80% OWNED BY THE SAME BANK.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS DISSEMINATED TO THE BOARD MEMBERS FOR REVIEW.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT HAVE A FORMAL POLICY TO MONITOR AND ENFORCE COMPLIANCE BUT IS IN THE PROCESS OF DEVELOPING ONE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE RETURNS ARE AVAILABLE FOR INSPECTION BY THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST, THROUGH THE GUIDESTAR WEBSITE AND THE MASSACHUSETTS ATTORNEY GENERAL'S WEBSITE.
